channel.title: Need serious help!
channel.description:
well heres the thing.
in my sprite file (in my client folder) i have a cool admin icon and i want that icon to show up when i say something on the game (you know like how the normal gold admin sign shows up when you say something, thats if ure admin)
can anyone help me please !! :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2009, 12:52:24 pm[/size][hr]theres got to be someone that can help me :confused:
